name: tiny copper hammered heart with pearl
description:
simple and perfect.....

this tiny (3/8 inch) copper heart is hammered and perfect for summer! the potato pearl can be added or left off depending on your mood! layer this piece with your other oak hill designs stamped necklaces for a great look! 

please leave your chain choice-rolo or cable-16, 18 or 20 inch or 17 inch black leather cord in the notes to seller here on etsy when you check out.

name: best friends puzzle piece keychain set of 4
description:
.......friends forever.....

this listing includes 4-1 x 1 1/2 stainless steel puzzle piece keychains, stamped to your specifications! pieces may include names, initials (shown) or word of your choice. however, they can only be stamped on one side as the impression shows thru to the other side. 

please leave your choice of initial, word or name for each piece in the notes to seller box here at paypal when you check out. 

PLEASE see my store front for current production times. 

be sure to 'like' oakhilldesigns on facebook where I do a TON of FREE product giveaways!

this 1 x 2 inch aluminum rectangle is stamped with a phrase perfect for every graduate on your list! a phrase so popular with the graduates! everyone loves a keychain!! I did hammer this keychain for a different look, but if you prefer the smooth finish, just let me know when you check out. 

please visit my store front for current production times!

name: rough double petite necklace
description:
..........rough double petite................

These 1/2 inch sterling silver discs are stamped with your name or word (if too long, it will be curved around the edge instead of in the middle) then hammered. A great freshwater pearl in the middle makes this necklace perfect! Wear it for casual and dressy days! 

Please leave your names/words and your rolo or cable chain choice (16,18 or 20 inch) in the notes to seller when you check out. 

**Check my store front for my current turnaround times. usual turnaround is 7-10 days, but during peak holidays will be MUCH LONGER! NO CANCELLATIONS OR REFUNDS WILL BE GIVEN IF YOU MISS A DEADLINE!**

Thanks for shopping Oak Hill Designs! check me out on facebook! 
~Lynn

.....Rough Silver Times 3....

Everyone loves sterling silver! This fun piece offers three layers of it! The bottom being one inch, middle 3/4 inch, and top 1/2 inch. I have hammered this one to give it a super fun look! If you prefer the shiny look, leave me a note when you check out. 

Information needed at etsy checkout.....
-name for smallest disc
-name for middle disc
-name for large disc
-font-jenna sue is shown in the large picture and the ashlyn font is shown in the smaller picture with the flat and not hammered discs
-chain choice-16, 18 or 20 inch cable or rolo chain or 18-20 inch adjustable black leather cord.

Thanks for shopping at Oak Hill Designs! check out my page on facebook!

description:
.a heartful of love...........

This great heart shape is hand stamped with the names of your loved ones OR your favorite phrase! up to 5 crystals complete this piece (crystals are used, not the 'traditional' stones). 

This is no small heart--it can fit perfectly in a 1.25 inch disc!

this heart can only be stamped with the designer font. 

Please leave the following at checkout: 
-names/words for the heart
-crystals, up to 5
-your chain choice-16, 18 or 20 inch cable or rolo chain or 18-20 inch adjustable black leather cord. I NO LONGER OFFER THE BALL CHAIN AS SHOWN! 

***Please see my store front for current production times. usual turnaround is 7-10 days, but during peak holidays, it WILL be MUCH LONGER! NO CANCELLATIONS WILL BE GIVEN!!****

mom.....

this listing features two 3/8 inch round, imperfect pebbles that are 100% pewter stamped with your initial of choice. these will be stamped with the newsprint font unless you specify otherwise. 

this necklace is my absolute favorite! it is simple enough for everyday but classy enough for a special occasion! 

please leave the initials wanted in the notes to seller at checkout and use the pull down menu on the right side of the screen for the font and the chain length. the font shown is typewriter. 

your necklace will come packaged in a muslin bag, perfect for gift giving and storage!

description:

this aluminum key chain is the perfect gift for someone special who is living far from home. the united states measures about 1 1/4 inch wide by 3/4 inch tall, so it is on the smaller side as far as charms go. **please note that southern florida is unable to be stamped.*** I will stamp as close to your location as possible! :) 

the back of this piece cannot be stamped-only the front side. 

please leave the states for stamping in the notes to seller when you check out here on etsy.

be sure to visit my store front for current production times!

description:

a 1 1/4 inch sterling silver disc is stamped with your choice of phrase or names OVER 60 letters but less than 73 and then domed to give it a great shape when added to the metal key ring. a brass disc is then stamped with grandpa/grandma/mom/dad and added to the ring as well.

**if you purchase this piece but don't have 60 letters or more, a smaller disc will be used so the product looks the best.*****

information needed at etsy checkout-
-your phrase or names OVER 60 letters. stamping starts on the outside edge and goes in towards the middle of the disc, so please give me the info in that order. 
-your word for the brass disc 


visit oakhilldesigns on facebook for your choice to WIN a free piece!
